name: SGD300 Prototype #1: Mario64 Clone
description:
An UE4 prototype featuring game mechanics based on Super Mario 64. This prototype features a double jump, dash, and sprint mechanic developed in C++.

This game was developed as part of assessment for USC course SGD300 Experimental Games Programming.

NB: I called this project "SuperIggySingleton" as a play on word for Super Mario Bros.
